home.hero_kicker: 100% healthy, for safety & peace of mind
home.hero_desc: 100% healthy, made to guarantee safety and peace of mind, so you can enjoy every moment of indulgence without a second thought.
home.hero_static_title: Your N¬∞1 Dietary Pastry, Family First. Safety Always
home.hero_typing_initial: All the pleasure, without the regret
hero_typing_words: All the pleasure, without the regret
All the pleasure, with all the safety
All the pleasure, with peace of mind
home.hero_testimonial: Your pistachio rolls light up our team evenings!
home.value1_desc: Crafted for your safety and peace of mind, using carefully selected natural ingredients.
home.value2_desc: Freshly prepared every day to ensure quality, safety, and consistent flavor.
home.value3_desc: Our flavors follow Moroccan harvests: Azemmour pistachios, Souss amlou, locally roasted coffee.
home.value4_desc: Built on honesty and responsibility, with clear sourcing and support for the local community.
home.story_heading: Born from awareness, dedicated to well-being
home.story_intro: Golden Sweet was founded in 2019, during the COVID-19 pandemic, when health and immunity became global priorities. This moment shaped our vision: indulgence should never come at the expense of well-being. From day one, we chose to create 100% natural, sugar-free pastries designed to be safe, balanced, and bring true peace of mind.
home.timeline_2019_desc: Complete removal of refined sugar and harmful ingredients, replaced with natural oils such as argan, olive, and coconut, and flours including barley, almond, and corn.
home.timeline_2021_desc: Continuous refinement of taste and texture, alongside strict standards for ingredient sourcing, preparation, and food safety.
home.timeline_2023_desc: Expansion of production and menu offerings while preserving freshness, safety, and our sugar-free, natural philosophy.
home.timeline_2026_desc: Expansion through franchising, bringing the Golden Sweet experience to new cities while maintaining the same quality, recipes, and standards worldwide.
home.provenance_desc: Golden Sweet crafts international flavors with Moroccan hands, using 100% natural ingredients. To keep freshness and safety, delivery remains focused locally.
home.provenance_solution_desc: Franchising, bringing Golden Sweet locally to the world.
home.hero_title: Artisan treats, day and night in Morocco, Tetouan & Morocco, Tangier
home.hero_description: Our soft rolls, golden cannel√©s and creamy drinks are handcrafted and delivered warm, even at 3 AM.
home.value1_desc_alt: Organic flours, raw sugars and healthy butters create recipes that are as delicious as they are responsible.
home.value2_desc_alt: Kneaded, rolled and glazed by hand, our products come fresh from the oven multiple times a day.
home.value3_desc_alt: Our flavors follow Moroccan harvests: Azemmour pistachios, Souss amlou, locally roasted coffee.
home.value4_desc_alt: Quality, traceability and support for local artisans: every roll funds community initiatives.
home.story_heading_alt: From family kitchen to the north's favorite sweet spot
home.story_intro_alt: Chef Aziza created Golden Sweet to offer 100% healthy cinnamon rolls to loved ones. Orders multiplied quickly, then night deliveries, until we opened our workshop in Morocco, Tetouan.
home.timeline_2019_desc_alt: One box, six soft rolls and word-of-mouth that spread across Morocco, Tetouan in weeks.
home.timeline_2021_desc_alt: Installation of our healthy lab and launch of pistachio, amlou and Moroccan coffee flavors.
home.timeline_2022_desc: 24/7 production to satisfy hotels, caf√©s and late-night neighbors.
home.timeline_2024_desc: Arrival of cannel√©s, past√©is de nata and colorful lattes to complement our iconic rolls.
home.provenance_desc_alt: Every roll starts with responsible sourcing. We select our nuts, coffees and aromatic plants from producers who share our healthy vision.
home.chef_heading: Meet Chef Aziza, creator of Golden Sweet rolls
home.chef_desc: Self-taught and passionate, Chef Aziza reimagines childhood pastries in healthy versions. She works soft textures, pistachio, amlou and Moroccan coffee flavors for generous rolls.
home.chef_technique: Signature technique: slow dough rise for incomparable softness.
home.chef_ingredient: Signature ingredient: homemade amlou with vegan honey, roasted weekly.
home.chef_commitment: Commitment: training young pastry chefs in healthy recipes.
home.events_form_note: Two emails per month, recipes and zero spam.
home.press_heading: They've tasted and approved our rolls
home.newsletter_heading: Receive our seasonal menus and night offers
home.catalog_desc: Turn the pages to discover our artisan story, crafted for those who refuse to compromise
home.catalog_page1_lead: We believe that true pleasure comes from purity.
home.catalog_page1_text: Since 2019, Golden Sweet has been crafting a new standard for pastry‚Äîwhere health and delight are inseparable.
home.catalog_page2_promise1_desc: Sweetened only with nature's finest ingredients.
home.catalog_page2_promise2_desc: Baked fresh every morning for peak flavor.
home.catalog_page2_promise3_desc: Strict hygiene standards for your peace of mind.
home.catalog_page3_text1: We carefully select high-quality argan oil, chosen for its purity and nutritional value in Essaouira.
home.catalog_page3_text2: Rich in antioxidants, it brings a nutty depth to our signature rolls that butter simply cannot match.
home.catalog_page4_lead: Nature does the lifting; we simply guide it.
home.catalog_page4_text: We rely on natural fermentation to wake up every grain. The dough ferments gently, developing depth of flavor while staying light, balanced, and kind to digestion.
home.catalog_page7_note: All rolls are 100% healthy & safe for all.
home.catalog_pairing1_desc: Balances the sweetness of the Classic Roll.
home.catalog_pairing2_desc: Intense notes to complement Chocolate Hazelnut.
home.catalog_pairing3_desc: Creamy finish for the Pistachio Roll.
home.catalog_page9_desc: Coming soon: A collection inspired by the orchards of Morocco, Tetouan.
home.catalog_page10_desc: The perfect gift. A curated selection of our finest rolls.
home.catalog_page12_desc: Make an impression with the taste of pure wellness. Perfect for corporate clients or wedding favors.
home.catalog_gift1_desc: Refined packaging designed to impress at first sight.
home.catalog_gift2_desc: Refined solutions suitable for professional occasions.
home.catalog_page13_desc: We believe in kindness to the earth as much as kindness to our bodies.
home.catalog_sustain2_desc: Minimizing carbon footprint by buying local.
home.catalog_service3_desc: Learn the art of healthy baking.
home.catalog_testimonial1_text: The most elegant pastry experience in Morocco.
home.catalog_testimonial2_text: Finally, guilt-free indulgence that actually tastes incredible.
home.catalog_page16_text: Every roll we bake is a promise kept‚Äîa promise that you don't have to choose between your health and your happiness. Welcome to our family.
home.catalog_page17_desc: Bring the Golden Sweet experience to your city.
home.testimonial_1_text: Delicious and healthy pastries ‚Äî thank you, Chef, for the quality and the service üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº
home.testimonial_2_text: A bakery specialized in healthy products, with no wheat and no sugar.
home.community_gallery_1_note: Delivery is available to the city of #tangier
home.community_gallery_2_alt: Healthy Dubai chocolate without gluten and sugar
home.community_gallery_2_note: Healthy Dubai chocolate without gluten and sugar.
home.product_classic_desc: Our signature roll with Ceylon cinnamon and creamy vanilla glaze.
home.product_choco_desc: Belgian dark chocolate melted on fluffy dough, topped with roasted hazelnuts.
home.product_caramel_desc: Salted caramel and crunchy pecans on a golden cinnamon base.
home.product_pasteis_desc: Vanilla cream, crispy puff pastry and caramelized muscovado sugar.
home.product_canneles_desc: Soft vanilla heart, caramelized shell and a touch of orange blossom.

home.product_box_desc: A shareable assortment of our iconic rolls: vanilla, caramel, chocolate, raspberry and pistachio.
home.product_raspberry_desc: Light vanilla cream, raspberry coulis and pink glaze on a soft roll.
home.product_mocha_desc: Mocha glaze with Gu√©liz coffee beans, blonde caramel and a touch of orange blossom.
home.community_desc: Every day, we share moments of guilt-free pleasure, healthy coffee breaks, fresh pastries, and simple joys made with confidence. Tag your moments and be part of the Golden Sweet story.
home.specials_party_desc: Choose a seasonal flavor, a botanical glaze, and we'll create a custom centerpiece.
home.specials_wholesale_desc: Our healthy products complement the offerings of cafes, hotels, and concept stores with 24/7 delivery.
home.cta_desc: 100% Healthy, sugar-free, gluten-free treats made fresh every day

lamaison.title: Our House | Golden Sweet
lamaison.hero_subtitle: From home kitchen to beloved pastry destination
lamaison.history_title: Born from awareness, dedicated to well-being
lamaison.history_text: Golden Sweet was founded in 2019, during the COVID-19 pandemic, when health and immunity became global priorities. This moment shaped our vision: indulgence should never come at the expense of well-being. From day one, we chose to create 100% natural, sugar-free pastries designed to be safe, balanced, and bring true peace of mind.
lamaison.timeline_2019_desc: From the very beginning, we made a clear choice to completely remove refined sugar and any ingredients that could negatively impact health. Our recipes were rebuilt using carefully selected natural oils such as argan, olive, and coconut, combined with alternative flours including barley, almond, and corn. The goal was simple: create pastries that are both enjoyable and genuinely better for the body.
lamaison.timeline_2021_desc: As the brand grew, our focus shifted to perfecting balance ‚Äî improving taste and texture without compromising our health-first philosophy. We introduced strict standards for ingredient sourcing, preparation methods, and food safety, ensuring consistency and reliability in every product, every day.
lamaison.timeline_2023_desc: Golden Sweet expanded its production capacity and menu offerings while remaining faithful to its core values. Each new product was developed with the same attention to freshness, safety, and sugar-free formulation, proving that growth can happen without sacrificing quality or integrity.
lamaison.timeline_2026_desc: Looking ahead, Golden Sweet‚Äôs ambition is to expand through franchising, allowing the brand to reach new cities and countries. By replicating our recipes, processes, and quality standards locally, we aim to offer the same safe, natural, and refined experience worldwide.
lamaison.value1_desc: Crafted for your safety and peace of mind, using carefully selected natural ingredients.
lamaison.value2_desc: Freshly prepared every day to ensure quality, safety, and consistent flavor.
lamaison.value3_desc: Our flavors follow Moroccan harvests: pistachios from Azemmour, amlou from Souss, coffee from trusted local roasters.
lamaison.value4_desc: Built on honesty and responsibility, with clear sourcing and support for the local community.
lamaison.vision_desc: We believe indulgence and well-being should go hand in hand. At Golden Sweet, we craft sugar-free, health-focused pastries without compromising taste, quality, or pleasure. Our vision is to grow across the world while staying true to our core values: clean ingredients, consistent quality, and trust. By refining our recipes and processes, we aim to make better pastry the new standard‚Äîaccessible, reliable, and genuinely healthier.

franchising.hero_desc: Bring healthy, dietary-friendly pastries to your community. Partner with us to open a Golden Sweet franchise and share the joy of guilt-free indulgence worldwide.
franchising.benefit1_desc: Leverage our established reputation for premium, healthy pastries. Join a movement that's redefining indulgence across continents.
franchising.benefit2_desc: Our tested recipes, streamlined operations, and customer loyalty strategies ensure you start with a winning formula.
franchising.benefit3_desc: From training to marketing, we provide end-to-end support to help you thrive. You're never alone on this journey.
franchising.benefit4_desc: Tap into the growing market for vegan and health-conscious consumers. Our unique positioning sets you apart from competitors.
franchising.benefit5_desc: With low overhead, premium pricing, and loyal customers, our franchise model delivers strong profit margins and sustainable growth.
franchising.benefit6_desc: Whether it's a cozy caf√©, mall kiosk, or cloud kitchen, we adapt our model to fit your market and investment capacity.
franchising.investment_subtitle: Transparent requirements for becoming a Golden Sweet franchise partner
franchising.inv_initial_desc: Includes equipment, training, site preparation, and initial inventory
franchising.inv_space_desc: Flexible options from kiosks to full caf√©s depending on your market
franchising.inv_royalty_desc: Ongoing support, marketing materials, social media agency and brand development included
franchising.inv_values_desc: Commitment to all the values and principles of the brand, in accordance with the conditions outlined in the operations manual
franchising.step1_desc: Fill out our franchise application form and tell us about your background, location preferences, and vision.
franchising.step2_desc: Meet our expansion team for an in-depth conversation about the opportunity, expectations, and mutual fit.
franchising.step3_desc: We help you identify the perfect location based on foot traffic, demographics, and market potential.
franchising.step4_desc: Up to 4-months training covering recipes, operations, customer service, and brand standards.
franchising.step5_desc: Launch with our support team on-site, marketing campaigns ready, and a community eager to taste Golden Sweet.
franchising.sup1_desc: Comprehensive guides covering every aspect of running your Golden Sweet location, from daily checklists to quality standards.
franchising.sup2_desc: Access our library of recipe tutorials, equipment handling, and customer experience training anytime, anywhere.
franchising.sup3_desc: Ready-to-use social media templates, print materials, local campaign strategies, and seasonal promotion calendars.
franchising.sup4_desc: Direct access to our franchise support team for operational questions, troubleshooting, and strategic guidance.
franchising.sup5_desc: Regular visits from our team to ensure brand standards, provide feedback, and identify growth opportunities.
franchising.sup6_desc: Connect with fellow franchise partners to share experiences, best practices, and build a supportive community.
franchising.faq1_q: Do I need pastries experience to become a franchisee?
franchising.faq1_a: While prior food service experience is helpful, it's not required. We provide comprehensive training that covers all aspects of operations. What we look for is passion for the brand, business acumen, and commitment to delivering excellent customer experiences.
franchising.faq2_a: We're actively expanding across the Middle East, Europe and the United States. Prime territories in major cities are available. We also consider applications from other regions on a case-by-case basis. Contact us to discuss specific locations.
franchising.faq3_q: How long does the training program last?
franchising.faq3_a: Our comprehensive training program can last up to four months. This includes a set period of training at our Morocco, Tetouan location, as well as on-site support at your location during the pre-opening phase.
franchising.faq4_q: Can I own multiple franchise locations?
franchising.faq4_a: Yes. We prioritize Developer Area (multiple units in a city) and Master Area (country-wide) partners, while also offering individual single-unit franchises.
franchising.faq5_q: What ongoing fees should I expect?
franchising.faq5_a: Our franchise model includes a 5% royalty fee on gross sales and a 2% social media agency fee. These fees support ongoing assistance, brand development, national marketing campaigns, and the continuous improvement of our systems and recipes.
franchising.cta_heading: Ready to Bring Golden Sweet to Your City?
franchising.cta_desc: Take the first step towards owning a franchise that delivers joy, health, and community connection.
franchising.options_lead: Pick the partnership model that fits your ambitions.
franchising.option1_desc: Open and operate a single Golden Sweet location in your city.
franchising.option2_desc: Develop multiple units within one city or metro area with structured rollouts.
franchising.option3_desc: Launch and oversee a network across an entire country with full support.
franchising.options_note: We are especially interested in Developer and Master Area partners.

menu.hero_lead: International food crafted by Moroccan hands. Every recipe meets all six pillars of healthy indulgence: lactose-free, sugar-free, uses white flour, no chemical yeast, gluten-free, and free from hydrogenated oil. While others hit one or two, Golden Sweet delivers all six in every bite.

legal.privacy_intro: Golden Sweet ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or place orders with us, in accordance with Moroccan Law 09-08 on the Protection of Personal Data.
legal.privacy_collect_info_intro: When you place an order or contact us, we may collect:
legal.privacy_collect_item5: Payment information (processed securely through our payment providers)
legal.privacy_auto_collect_intro: We may automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
legal.privacy_auto_item3: Pages visited and time spent on our website
legal.privacy_use_intro: We use the information we collect to:
legal.privacy_use_item2: Communicate with you about your orders and deliveries
legal.privacy_use_item3: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
legal.privacy_use_item4: Send you marketing communications (only with your consent)
legal.privacy_basis_intro: Under Moroccan Law 09-08, we process your personal data based on:
legal.privacy_basis_item1: Contract execution: To fulfill orders and provide our services
legal.privacy_basis_item2: Consent: For marketing communications and cookies
legal.privacy_basis_item3: Legal obligation: To comply with tax, accounting, and consumer protection laws
legal.privacy_basis_item4: Legitimate interest: To improve our services and prevent fraud
legal.privacy_sharing_intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:
legal.privacy_sharing_item1: Delivery partners: To fulfill your orders
legal.privacy_sharing_item2: Payment processors: To process transactions securely
legal.privacy_sharing_item3: Service providers: Who assist in operating our website and business
legal.privacy_sharing_item4: Legal authorities: When required by Moroccan law or to protect our rights
legal.privacy_security_desc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
legal.privacy_retention_intro: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to:
legal.privacy_retention_item1: Fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy
legal.privacy_retention_item2: Comply with legal obligations (e.g., tax records for 10 years as per Moroccan law)
legal.privacy_retention_item3: Resolve disputes and enforce our agreements
legal.privacy_rights_intro: Under Moroccan Law 09-08, you have the right to:
legal.privacy_rights_item1: Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
legal.privacy_rights_item2: Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
legal.privacy_rights_item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your data (subject to legal obligations)
legal.privacy_rights_item4: Opposition: Object to the processing of your data for marketing purposes
legal.privacy_rights_item5: Withdrawal of consent: Withdraw consent at any time
legal.privacy_rights_contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:
legal.privacy_cookies_desc: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings. For more information, see our Cookie Policy.
legal.privacy_children_desc: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
legal.privacy_transfer_desc: Your data is primarily stored and processed in Morocco. If we transfer data outside Morocco, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.
legal.privacy_changes_desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website with an updated "Last updated" date.
legal.privacy_supervisory_intro: If you have concerns about how we handle your data, you may contact the Moroccan National Commission for the Control of the Protection of Personal Data (CNDP):
legal.refund_intro: At Golden Sweet, we are committed to providing fresh, high-quality pastries made with 100% natural ingredients. Your satisfaction is our priority. This Refund & Return Policy complies with Moroccan consumer protection law (Law 31-08).
legal.refund_perishable_intro: Due to the fresh and perishable nature of our products, we have specific policies regarding refunds and returns:
legal.refund_perishable_item1: All pastries are freshly baked and prepared to order
legal.refund_perishable_item2: Products contain no preservatives and have a limited shelf life
legal.refund_perishable_item3: For food safety and hygiene reasons, we cannot accept returns of consumed products
legal.refund_eligible_intro: We will provide a refund or replacement in the following cases:
legal.refund_quality_item2: Products that do not meet our quality standards
legal.refund_quality_item3: Products with visible defects or contamination
legal.refund_quality_item4: Incorrect products delivered (different from what was ordered)
legal.refund_delivery_item1: Order not delivered within the promised timeframe
legal.refund_delivery_item3: Order delivered to wrong address due to our error
legal.refund_dietary_item2: Product does not meet dietary specifications confirmed at time of order
legal.refund_non_eligible_intro: We cannot provide refunds in the following cases:
legal.refund_non_eligible_item1: Change of mind after order completion
legal.refund_non_eligible_item4: Products properly delivered but not consumed within recommended timeframe
legal.refund_non_eligible_item6: Products damaged after delivery due to customer handling
legal.refund_request_step_intro: If you believe you are entitled to a refund, please follow these steps:
legal.refund_step1_desc: Report the issue within 24 hours of delivery:
legal.refund_step2_intro: To process your refund request, please provide:
legal.refund_step2_item2: Clear photos of the product and issue
legal.refund_step3_intro: We will review your request and respond within 48 hours with one of the following solutions:
legal.refund_step3_item1: Full refund to original payment method
legal.refund_step3_item2: Replacement order at no additional cost
legal.refund_processing_item1: Cash payments: Refund within 7 business days
legal.refund_processing_item2: Bank transfer: Refund within 7-10 business days
legal.refund_processing_item3: Credit/Debit card: Refund within 10-14 business days (depending on your bank)
legal.refund_cancel_p1_intro: You may cancel your order free of charge if:
legal.refund_cancel_p1_item1: The order has not yet been prepared (usually within 30 minutes of order placement)
legal.refund_cancel_p2_intro: If your order is already being prepared:
legal.refund_cancel_p2_item2: We will assess on a case-by-case basis
legal.refund_cancel_custom_item1: Cancellation must be made at least 48 hours before delivery time
legal.refund_cancel_custom_item2: Cancellations with less than 48 hours notice may incur a 50% cancellation fee
legal.refund_cancel_custom_item3: No refunds for custom orders canceled within 24 hours of delivery
legal.refund_wholesale_desc: Different terms may apply for wholesale and business clients. Please refer to your specific contract or contact us at contact@goldensweet.ma.
legal.refund_rights_intro: Under Moroccan consumer protection law, you have the right to:
legal.refund_rights_item1: Receive products that conform to the description
legal.refund_rights_item2: Request a refund or replacement for defective products
legal.refund_rights_item3: Be informed of product ingredients and allergens
legal.refund_exceptions_item1: Force majeure: Extreme weather, natural disasters, or other uncontrollable events
legal.refund_exceptions_item2: National emergencies: Government restrictions or public health orders
legal.refund_exceptions_footer: We reserve the right to modify this policy temporarily. Affected customers will be notified directly.
legal.refund_dispute_intro: If you are not satisfied with our resolution, you may:
legal.refund_dispute_item1: Contact the Moroccan Ministry of Industry and Commerce consumer protection department
legal.refund_dispute_item2: Seek mediation through local consumer protection associations
legal.refund_dispute_item3: File a complaint with competent courts in Morocco, Tetouan, Morocco
legal.terms_intro: By accessing and using the Golden Sweet website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.
legal.terms_business_desc: Golden Sweet is a bakery business operating in Morocco, specializing in 100% natural, sugar-free pastries and baked goods.
legal.terms_business_item2: Address: Mourrir, Jamae Oma, No 9 Av. Mohamed Hajjaj, Morocco, Tetouan, Morocco
legal.terms_prohibited_item1: Use the website for any illegal purpose
legal.terms_prohibited_item2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
legal.terms_prohibited_item4: Copy, reproduce, or distribute our content without permission
legal.terms_prohibited_item6: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
legal.terms_prohibited_item7: Scrape or collect data using automated means
legal.terms_order_item1: All orders are subject to acceptance and availability
legal.terms_order_item2: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order
legal.terms_order_item3: Order confirmation will be sent via email or SMS
legal.terms_order_item4: Prices are in Moroccan Dirhams (MAD) and include applicable taxes
legal.terms_payment_intro: We accept the following payment methods:
legal.terms_payment_footer: Payment must be made in full before or upon delivery. Prices are subject to change without notice.
legal.terms_delivery_item1: Delivery is available to Morocco, Tetouan and Morocco, Tangier
legal.terms_delivery_item2: Free delivery on orders above 500 MAD
legal.terms_delivery_item3: Delivery times are estimates and not guaranteed
legal.terms_delivery_item4: You must provide accurate delivery information
legal.terms_delivery_item5: Failed deliveries due to incorrect information may incur additional charges
legal.terms_product_item1: We strive to provide accurate product descriptions and images
legal.terms_product_item2: Colors and appearance may vary slightly from images
legal.terms_product_item3: All products contain 100% natural ingredients with no refined sugar
legal.terms_product_item4: Allergen information is provided to the best of our knowledge
legal.terms_product_item5: If you have severe allergies, please contact us before ordering
legal.terms_ip_intro: All content on this website, including but not limited to:
legal.terms_ip_footer: Are the property of Golden Sweet and protected by Moroccan and international intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
legal.terms_user_intro: If we offer account creation in the future:
legal.terms_user_item1: You are responsible for maintaining account security
legal.terms_user_item2: You must provide accurate and current information
legal.terms_user_item3: You are responsible for all activities under your account
legal.terms_user_item4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
legal.terms_health_item1: All products are prepared following strict hygiene standards
legal.terms_health_item2: Products should be consumed within recommended timeframes
legal.terms_health_item3: Store products according to instructions provided
legal.terms_allergen_item1: Our products may contain or be produced in facilities that handle common allergens
legal.terms_allergen_item3: Contact us if you have specific dietary requirements
legal.terms_liability_intro: To the fullest extent permitted by Moroccan law:
legal.terms_liability_item1: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
legal.terms_liability_item2: Our total liability shall not exceed the purchase price of the affected order
legal.terms_liability_item3: We are not responsible for delays due to force majeure
legal.terms_liability_item4: We are not liable for allergic reactions if allergen information was provided
legal.terms_warranty_intro: Our website and services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee:
legal.terms_warranty_item2: Accuracy of all information on the website
legal.terms_warranty_item3: Specific results from using our products
legal.terms_indemnity_intro: You agree to indemnify and hold Golden Sweet harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from:
legal.terms_indemnity_item1: Your violation of these Terms of Use
legal.terms_indemnity_item2: Your use of our website or services
legal.terms_indemnity_item3: Your violation of any third-party rights
legal.terms_privacy_desc: Your use of our services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which complies with Moroccan Law 09-08 on Personal Data Protection. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
legal.terms_third_party_desc: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these websites.
legal.terms_mods_desc: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms.
legal.terms_severability_desc: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
legal.terms_jurisdiction_desc: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of Morocco. Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of our services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Morocco, Tetouan, Morocco.
legal.terms_language_desc: These Terms of Use are provided in English and may be translated into other languages. In case of any conflict, the English version shall prevail.
legal.terms_age_desc: Our services are intended for users 18 years of age or older. If you are under 18, you may only use our services with the involvement of a parent or guardian.
legal.terms_entire_agreement_desc: These Terms of Use, together with our Privacy Policy and Refund Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Golden Sweet regarding your use of our services.
legal.terms_acknowledgment_desc: By using Golden Sweet's website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.
legal.contact_questions: If you have questions about this policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
